t: I*pn will give You thanks with all my heart; I*ln will sing praises to You before the gods.
I*ln will bow down toward Your holy temple And*ln give thanks to Your name for Your lovingkindness and Your truth; For*ln You have magnified Your word according to all Your name.
On*ln the day I called, You answered me; You*ln made me bold with strength in my soul.
All*ln the kings of the earth will give thanks to You, O Lord,*s When*ln they have heard the words of Your mouth.
And*ln they will sing of the ways of the Lord,*s For*ln great is the glory of the Lord.*s
For*ln though the Lord*s is exalted, Yet*ln He regards the lowly, But*ln the haughty He knows from afar.
Though*ln I walk in the midst of trouble, You will revive me; You*ln will stretch forth Your hand against the wrath of my enemies, And*ln Your right hand will save me.
The*ln Lord*s will accomplish what concerns me; Your*ln lovingkindness, O Lord,*s is everlasting; Do*ln not forsake the works of Your hands.
